headline: Invesco Accelerates Private Markets Partnership with Barings
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, today announced the completion of the first initiative in its strategic partnership with Barings, signaling its commitment to delivering differentiated private markets solutions to investors. In its fifth month since announcing the partnership, Invesco's $131 billion1 private markets business is coming to market with the now jointly managed Invesco Dynamic Credit Opportunity Fund, a closed-end interval fund that dynamically alloca
